comments.body: Likewise, we probably want to mention a third component, the akka-less API.
@stephencompall-DA what is that 3rd component? We have not tested Scala codegen with anything else but akka-based API.

you technically can send generated commands using any existing API, doesn't have to be scala akka-based bindings, can be java rx-based api too. But the 3rd component... is something I am not aware of.
